title: Integration Services
tagline: Connect your systems with transparent, fixed-fee integrations
overview: Stop copying data between systems. Get fixed-fee API and file integrations with transparent data mapping, regular progress updates, and training included.
whatIOffer: Experienced integration professional with 100+ integrations handling 1M+ daily operations
Support for REST, SOAP, GraphQL APIs and file-based integrations
Transparent data mapping with configuration options for self-service
Optional hosting and ongoing support for maintaining integrations
howItWorks: Free consultation to understand your integration needs
Fixed-fee proposal (no overages or surprise charges)
Regular progress updates every 1-2 days during development
Documentation and training included for 10+ hour projects

sections.heading: Overview
sections.tagline: Connect your systems for seamless data flow
benefits: Built 100+ integrations handling 1M+ daily operations
Support for REST, SOAP, GraphQL APIs and file-based integrations
Transparent data mapping with configuration options for self-service adjustments
Fixed-fee project pricing based on estimated hours - no surprise charges

sections.heading: Engagement Options
sections.tagline: Start with a free consultation, then choose what works best for your needs

sections.heading: Building an Integration
sections.tagline: Transparent process from consultation to completion
sections.cta: Fixed-fee integration projects with regular updates throughout development

sections.heading: API Integrations
sections.tagline: Connect modern platforms via REST, SOAP, and GraphQL
benefits: Support for REST, SOAP, and GraphQL API protocols
Secure authentication with OAuth, JWT, and API keys
Optional hosting available for monthly fee (AWS pass-through pricing based on volume)
Retainer agreements for ongoing support can include waived hosting fees

sections.cta: Build reliable API connections between your platforms

sections.heading: Transparent Data Mapping
sections.tagline: Clear documentation of how your data flows
benefits: Comprehensive documentation of data mapping between systems
Collaboration on optional pathways and business logic decisions
Configuration options enabling you to adjust mappings yourself in the future
Support for multiple formats: JSON, XML, CSV, and EDI (with documentation)
sections.cta: Understand exactly how your data flows between systems

sections.heading: Enterprise System Integration
sections.tagline: Connect ERP, CRM, accounting, and development platforms
benefits: Experience with Salesforce, SAP, NetSuite, Sage Intacct, QuickBooks, and more
Development platform integrations: DataDog, AWS, GitHub, SonarCloud, Sentry
Legacy system modernization and API wrapping
Enterprise-grade security and compliance

sections.heading: File Integrations
benefits: Support for CSV, JSON, XML, Excel, and other structured file formats
SFTP, FTP, and cloud storage (S3, Google Drive, Dropbox) file transfers
Automated scheduling for regular imports/exports
Data validation and error handling for malformed files
